articles.description: Early machine-learning systems were inspired by neural networks — now AI might allow neuroscientists to get to grips with the brain’s unique complexities.

articles.author: Science X
articles.title: 'Biodiversity time machine' provides insights into a century of loss - Phys.org
articles.description: Scientists have run the first proof of concept of their DNA 'time machine' to shed light on a century of environmental change in a freshwater lake—including warming temperatures and pollution, leading to the potentially irreversible loss of biodiversity.
